create.query: CREATE TABLE run_reports_context_tbl WITH (format = 'Parquet', parquet_compression = 'SNAPPY') AS SELECT * FROM run_reports_context_view;
CREATE TABLE run_reports_leftover_tbl WITH (format = 'Parquet', parquet_compression = 'SNAPPY') AS SELECT * FROM run_reports_leftover_view;
CREATE TABLE run_reports_logic_tbl WITH (format = 'Parquet', parquet_compression = 'SNAPPY') AS SELECT * FROM run_reports_logic_view;
CREATE TABLE run_reports_to_delete_tbl WITH (format = 'Parquet', parquet_compression = 'SNAPPY') AS SELECT * FROM run_reports_to_delete_view;
